item.description:
Admit it, by the end of the week you do not have enough brain cells to read a book. So instead of a book club like many other moms' groups, we are doing a TV-watching club! 

This fall, we'll be watching Couple Fantasy, which sounds like a porno  but is in fact a Korean TV drama based on the 1987 Goldie Hawn movie, Overboard. We'll watch two episodes per week, at someone's house or on your own at home on Hulu.

If you can't make it in person, you can watch at home by going HERE, and live chat with others watching along on our Facebook page. If Friday nights don't work for you, watch on your own time during the week and discuss on our Facebook page. 

Another BYOB potluck this week, this time in Hot Dot! Please let Yooree know if you'd like to host a future screening.

Please list in comments what you are bringing for food.
item.name: The AV (Asian Video) Club: Couple Fantasy
